meanings.definition: A person's name written in a distinctive way as a form of identification.
meanings.sent1: My signature is unique to me and helps people know who I am.
meanings.sent2: Please put your signature at the bottom of the page to confirm your identity.
meanings.sent3: I pretended to be a detective and signed my name with a fancy signature.
meanings.sent4: Her signature style of writing stood out like a colorful painting in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's signature on the painting was so beautiful that it became a work of art itself.

meanings.definition: A distinctive pattern, product, or characteristic by which someone or something can be identified.
meanings.sent1: The logo on the box is the company's signature design.
meanings.sent2: The scent of fresh cookies baking in the oven is a signature of Grandma's house.
meanings.sent3: The cat's signature meow always sounded like a tiny trumpet.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range's signature silhouette against the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The actor's signature move in the dance routine wowed the audience every time.

meanings.definition: To sign or authorize a document with one's signature.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to signature the contract before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He will signature the agreement to make it official.
meanings.sent3: I had to signature so many papers that my hand started to ache.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to signature the letter sealed her fate in the company.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's decision to signature the deal marked a new chapter for the business.
